",confirmButtonColor:"rgb(83, 166, 250)",allowOutsideClick:false,allowEscapeKey:false,allowEnterKey:false,timer:4000});}else{Swal.fire({text:"Location saved successfully!",icon:"success",toast:true,position:"top",showConfirmButton:false,timer:3000});//create a database attribute and save it db.create("HOME_PAGE_SEEN",true);db.create("USER_DEFAULT_LOCATION",$defaultLocation);db.create("TRACK_SAVED_LOCATION_WEATHER",false);db.create("WEATHER_UNIT","metric");navigate("weather");}});}});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"weather-preloader container-fluid d-flex align-items-center flex-column",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"my-5 preloader-weather-heading",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center text-capitalize m-auto fw-bold fs-2",children:"How's today's weather?"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"m-auto text-center img-container my-md-4 my-3",id:"img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:Img_1,className:"img-fluid m-auto preloader-img",height:"700",width:"550",alt:"current-weather-status"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{text:"today's weather",style:customBtnStyle,className:"brand-btn m-auto my-5 width-toggle",onClick:event=>{click(event);}})]})]});};export default Home;
